abstract: Boston's Olympic bid committee releases details about insurance proposals it promises to purchase to minimize risk to taxpayers if there were unanticipated costs.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of Boston’s bid for the 2024 Summer Olympics released details about insurance proposals that they said would provide unprecedented coverage for Massachusetts taxpayers.

headline.main: Insurance Details for Boston Bid Released

snippet: Leaders of Boston’s bid for the 2024 Summer Olympics released details about insurance proposals that they said would provide unprecedented coverage for Massachusetts taxpayers.
